Container.Name: shlink-web-client
Container.Overview: A ReactJS-based progressive web application for shlink. 1. Install shlink 2. CLI to it and enter "shlink api-key:generate" 3. Copy the api and add and edit to servers.json
Container.Description: A ReactJS-based progressive web application for shlink. 1. Install shlink 2. CLI to it and enter "shlink api-key:generate" 3. Copy the api and add and edit to servers.json

Config.Name: Server Config File
Config.Description: Server Config File (Must be created first before applying the docker template) https://hub.docker.com/r/shlinkio/shlink-web-client/
